pos_mean_info_list.mean: 解决，处理；[会计] 结算；沉降；殖民

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指经过思考、比较、讨论或询问之后做出的决定。
语气较强，强调以坚定不移的信念去做或不做某事，暗含有远大抱负和坚强决心。
指经过深思熟虑，决心去做某事并坚持施行。
指排除犹豫、怀疑和争论之后作出明确的最终结论。
文学上的用词，口语中通常用live代替。
强调人或动物居住在某个地区并已适应某种特殊环境。
书面用词，指合法的永久性居住，也指在豪华的住宅里居住。
侧重指某人定居于城市、国家或地区，而不指居住的住所。
最普通用词，指固定的居住，可以是长期的，也可以是临时的。

word_group.brief_definition: 与…结清账目；向…报复；跟…算账
报复；偿还债务；履行义务
报复；偿还债务；履行义务
彻底制服某人；摆平某人
专心致志于...；专心做...；安定下来

bilingual.source: They decided to settle the dispute with a duel.
bilingual.target: 他们决定通过决斗来解决争端。

bilingual.source: They decided to settle the issue through a lawsuit.
bilingual.target: 他们决定通过官司解决问题。

bilingual.source: They tried to settle the dispute through negotiation.
bilingual.target: 他们试图通过谈判解决争议。

bilingual.source: The company offered compensation to settle the dispute.
bilingual.target: 公司提供了赔偿以解决纠纷。

bilingual.source: It's important to settle any misunderstandings quickly.
bilingual.target: 迅速解决任何误解是很重要的。

bilingual.source: They appointed an arbiter to settle the disagreement.
bilingual.target: 他们任命了一位仲裁者来解决分歧。

bilingual.source: The mediator helped them settle their dispute amicably.
bilingual.target: 调解员帮助他们友好地解决了争端。

bilingual.source: We need to settle this argument before it escalates.
bilingual.target: 我们需要解决这个争论，以免事态升级。

bilingual.source: Both parties agreed to let an arb settle their differences.
bilingual.target: 双方同意让仲裁员解决他们的分歧。

bilingual.source: They agreed to enter mediation to settle their differences.
bilingual.target: 他们同意进入调解程序以解决他们的分歧。

list.abstract: settle是一个英语单词，可以用作名词和动词，可以翻译为解决、安排，等等。
《Settle》是WELL、崔辉星合唱的一首歌曲，由WELL作词作曲，于2018年12月7日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, you know what? I know how to settle this. All right here, this is what we're gonna do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道该怎么解决了，按这个办。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, the only reason I can over here was to settle things between us. Okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来这里解决我们之间的问题，你帮了我很多忙。

yingyinNormal.en: Step 2: Before the Chinese New Year arrives, clean your house, and settle any outstanding debts with friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二步：在中国新年到来之前，清扫房屋，解决和朋友之间的未清债务。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you? No. But I need it. It's the only way to settle the contradictions between gravity and quantum mechanics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能吗？不能。但我需要啊。这是唯一有办法解决重力与量子力学间矛盾的方法了。

yingyinNormal.en: Live boldly, Clark. Push yourself. Don't settle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大胆地生活吧，克拉克，勇往直前，永不妥协。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, settle down. Take it easy. I'm, I'm...What the scallop?
yingyinNormal.zh: 安静下来，没事的。我，我……到底怎么回事？！

yingyinNormal.en: Rech, we've got to settle. Settle what? The Jamestown colony of Virginia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋，我们得算帐(定居) 。什么定居？在维吉尼亚的詹姆斯敦殖民地。

yingyinNormal.en: I feel we must settle the question of who is to manage the baby's property.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我们得定下来由谁来打理孩子的财产。

yingyinNormal.en: If they return, they will settle terms of peace and negotiate those terms with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们回来了，他们会签订和平协议，并与他协商那些条件。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, settle down. Take your seats. Thank you, thank you. Thank you, Stan. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好啦，静静，回到座位上，谢谢，谢谢，谢谢，斯坦，谢了。

yingyinNormal.en: Let him settle in. Give him time. How does nine months sound? I'm having another baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让他慢慢适应吧，给他点时间。九个月听起来够吗？我又怀孕了。

yingyinNormal.en: When the earth starts to settle, God throws a stone at it. And believe me he's winding up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每当地球开始尘埃落定，上帝就会扔一块石头下来，相信我他是在清理。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just saying, Christmas should be white and snowy. I'd even settle for Manhattan slush. Mm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是觉得圣诞节应该是白色的，下着雪的，我从来没有走在曼哈顿的雪地上过。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, for a man who's supposed to be avoiding stress you picked a hell of a place to settle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于一个需要躲避压力的人来说，你倒是挑了一个好地方。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, folks. I'd like to call this hearing back to order. If we could settle, please. Take your seats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，各位，我宣布听证会继续进行，请安静下来，好吗？都请坐好。

yingyinNormal.en: All right look, I think it's time for you to settle down. You know? Make a choice, pick a lane. Who's Elaine?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该定下来了做个选择，选一条“路”。谁是伊莱恩？（与“路”谐音）

yingyinNormal.en: Now, when you put the beef in, just make sure it has time to just settle a little bit before you start to stir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放入牛肉后，要保证牛肉在锅底煎一小会，然后再开始翻炒。

yingyinNormal.en: Now that we're all friends, you can call me Lawrence. And why don't we settle in? It's a long ride to the front.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然我们是朋友了，你可以叫我劳伦斯，不如我们安顿下来吧，前路漫漫。

yingyinNormal.en: No, he had to settle for a presidential library. So it's been some time since you and I have had a chance to catch up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，只能委屈他拿一栋总统图书馆凑合了。我们都好久没聊聊了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll fetch his things and settle his debts and have a service at home to say goodbye. That sounds like a very good plan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会收拾他的私人物件，偿清他的债务，在家办个仪式跟他告别。这主意听上去不错。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 正式协议；解决；定居点；财产赠与；结算；清账；沉降；定居；定居行动；和解

word_family.mean: v. 解决；达成；结束；安定；安顿；舒舒服服地坐下；定居；决定；安顿下来；确定

examination_example.sentence: They would be employed in their later years even if they had enough money to <highlight>settle</highlight> down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使他们有足够的钱安顿下来，他们也会在晚年就业。

examination_example.sentence: Today's farm laborers are more likely to be <highlight>settled</highlight> rather than migrating and more likely to be married than single.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今的农业劳动者更有可能定居下来，而不是继续迁移；而且也更有可能已婚而非单身。

word_usage.usage: settle既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词、代词、带或不带疑问词的动词不定式（如：to do/when to do的形式）或that/wh-引导的从句，如：We haven't settled where to go yet. 我们还没有决定去哪里。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 决定; 达成协议; 解决

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>settled</highlight> on a small island north of England.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在英格兰北部的一个小岛上定居下来。

sense_info_list.en: fall or come down onto a surface

examination_example.sentence: The biggest concern of pumping out water from this deep in the gradual <highlight>settling</highlight> down of the land surface.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从这么深的地方抽水，最大的问题是土地表面逐渐沉降。

sense_info_list.en: resolve or reach an agreement about an argument or problem
sense_info_list.zh: 决定; 达成协议; 解决

examination_example.sentence: It's best to take on the most difficult task second—once they're <highlight>settled</highlight>, but before they get tired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好是把最困难的任务放在第二位——一旦他们安定下来，但要在他们累之前。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 正式协议；解决；定居点；财产赠与；结算；清账；沉降；定居；定居行动；和解

word_family.mean: v. 解决；达成；结束；安定；安顿；舒舒服服地坐下；定居；决定；安顿下来；确定

examination_example.sentence: Everyone in the family <highlight>settled</highlight> quickly into the city except me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了我，家里的每个人都很快适应了这个城市。

examination_example.sentence: Soon afterwards, many of those people started <highlight>settling</highlight> down to become farmers, and their languages too became more settled and fewer in number.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久之后，这些人中的许多人开始定居下来，成为农民，他们的语言也变得越来越稳定，数量也越来越少了。

examination_example.sentence: People <highlight>settle</highlight> in these places because they are easy to get to and naturally suited to communications and trade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们在这些地方定居是因为它们容易到达，并且天然适合于交通和贸易。

examination_example.sentence: Founded in Moscow after the 1905 revolution, the company eventually <highlight>settled</highlight> in Tel Aviv in the late 1920s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1905年革命后，该公司在莫斯科成立，最终在20世纪20年代末落户特拉维夫。

examination_example.sentence: Soon afterwards, many of those people started settling down to become farmers, and their languages too became more <highlight>settled</highlight> and fewer in number.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久之后，这些人中的许多人开始定居下来，成为农民，他们的语言也变得越来越稳定，数量也越来越少了。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>settled</highlight> in at a comfortable East Side cafe and within minutes, another customer was approaching their table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在东区一家舒适的咖啡馆落座，没过几分钟，就有另一位顾客走近他们的桌子。

sample.mean: n. 物品；人才；品质；优点；资产

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 正式协议；解决；定居点；财产赠与；结算；清账；沉降；定居；定居行动；和解

word_family.mean: v. 解决；达成；结束；安定；安顿；舒舒服服地坐下；定居；决定；安顿下来；确定

examination_example.sentence: With the beginning of farming, early humans began to <highlight>settle</highlight> down (定居).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着农耕的开始，早期人类开始定居。

examination_example.sentence: When Li Bai was five years old, his family <highlight>settled</highlight> in a town in today's Sichuan province.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当李白五岁的时候，他的家人定居在今天四川省的一个小镇上。

examination_example.sentence: I finally made it to a safe classroom, and 20 other students and I <highlight>settled</highlight> in for lockdown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我终于到了一个安全的教室，我和其他20名学生安顿下来，准备闭关。
